description: Get a list of grids with thumbnails embedded limited to n grids

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the amout of grids returned

requests.curl:
curl "www.beta-malimartv.elasticbeanstalk.com/grids?include=thumbnails&limit=2" -X GET \
	-H "Api-Version: v1" \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJ3d3cuYmV0YS1tYWxpbWFydHYuZWxhc3RpY2JlYW5zdGFsay5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE1OTE1Njc2ODQuNDU0MTExNiwidXNlciI6eyJpZCI6MSwibG9naW4iOiJkb2N0b3IxNzkud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwiZW1haWwiOiJkb2N0b3IxNzkud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwib3JpZ2luIjoibG9jYWwiLCJwcmVtaXVtIjpmYWxzZX0sImV4cCI6MTU5MTY1NDA4NH0.exCQ7HtT9ozay3kkHBEW7gDmDkOSZNBweNtaa4Iw9PLGOh6BrYcfrxDyapmJN-3zjQQAfXruX0LdJcPW4jtTvA"
